derivation: from H1342 (גָּאָה); the same as H1346 (גַּאֲוָה)xlit gaʻăvâh corrected to gaʼăvâh
outline:
1. exaltation, majesty, pride
    1. majesty, exaltation, excellence
      1. of nations
      2. of God
      3. of the Jordan
    2. pride, arrogance (bad sense)
kjv_def: arrogancy, excellency(-lent), majesty, pomp, pride, proud, swelling.
